QuestionJSON.Question: Dakota is trying to model the process of how 15th century explorers used the astrolabe during their expeditions. Using simple commands such as `turnRight`, `moveForward`, `lookAtStar`, `calculateAngle`, `determineDirection`, which of the following pseudo-codes best describes this process?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: The explorers had to first look at a star, then calculate its angle to determine their direction using the astrolabe. Once they knew which direction they had to go, they then moved forward in that direction. The actions `turnRight` does not properly represent any part of this historical process.
